messages.title: CORBY NEEDS YOU!
messages.content: We can all see the change that Labour has made to Corby. We must not risk Corby going back to the dark days of the Tory 1980s. Corby needs your vote. Don't sit at home. A vote for Labour is a vote for Corby's future. VOTE HOPE FOR CORBY.

keyPolicies.policyDescription:
1. New hospital and cancer pledge at risk from Tory cuts
2. Your children's centre and tax credits at risk from Tory cuts
3. Your university centre and school at risk from Tory cuts
4. Your bus pass and winter fuel cash at risk from Tory cuts
5. Your Corby and your family - a better future only with Labour

issues.economy: Your children's centre and tax credits at risk from Tory cuts.

issues.health: New hospital and cancer pledge at risk from Tory cuts.
issues.socialWelfare: Your bus pass and winter fuel cash at risk from Tory cuts.

images.caption: Corby leaflet featuring Phil Hope with political messages and key policies

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Julie Brookfield on behalf of Phil Hope, both at Labour Co-op; printed by Bishops Ltd.
